alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 13 at 9:15AM CST until February 15 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Sumter and Pickens Counties. Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Hale, Marengo and Sumter Counties. .Flooding continues on the Tombigbee River and a flood warning remains in effect at Bevill Lock and Dam, and Demopolis Lock and Dam. Another statement will be issued by late tonight, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING TO WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening to Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 68.0 feet, Flooding of lowlands in the area occurs and cattle should be moved to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CST Monday the stage was 63.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening to a crest of 68.1 feet early Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 68.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
